SummaryEnglish: Osamu Dazai is a genius best-selling author. He has a pregnant wife Michiko and two children, but his life is a total mess. He has affairs with women and attempts suicides repeatedly. His pupil Shizuko and a widow Tomie step into his life, and he comes to struggle with love for three women, his wife and two mistresses. Which causes the "the biggest scandal of Japanese literature history"â€¦
